title: Got This Boy in Love
lyrics:
They said no way, it'll never happen
No chance that I would ever settle down
But if I did it would take a woman
Strong enough to sort this ole boy out
And girl I know I didn't make it easy on you

I was a burning building but you still walked right through



And now I'm holding you in my arms

And you're looking like an angel

When I hear your voice, I run

And put the world away a minute

'Cause I only want you in it

Girl you're everything I want



Where you kiss me baby I can't get enough

But the biggest crime that you ever committed

Is you got this boy in love

Yeah you've got this boy in love



It took so long, I couldn't see it

I get so stubborn I can't find my way

But I'm getting better and you're the reason

I wake up smiling every single day



And now I'm holding you in my arms

And you're looking like an angel

When I hear your voice, I run

And put the world away a minute

'Cause I only want you in it

Girl you're everything I want



Where you kiss me baby I can't get enough

But the biggest crime that you ever committed

Is you got this boy in love

Yeah you've got this boy in love



And every time your car pulls in

My door flies open once again

And I still can't believe that you're mine

So let's rule the world, let's set the date

Just talking 'bout it I can't wait

To be with you forever

To stay with you forever



And now I'm holding you in my arms

And you're looking like an angel

When I hear your voice, I run

And put the world away a minute

'Cause I only want you in it

Girl you're everything I want



Where you kiss me baby I can't get enough

But the biggest crime that you ever committed

Is you got this boy in love

Yeah you've got this boy in love
